mapper.insert: insert into yomul_vendors(no, owner, name, category, info, tel, addr) values(#{no}, #{owner}, #{name}, #{category}, #{info}, #{tel}, #{addr})
mapper.select: select count(*) from yomul_vendor_customers where vendor_no = #{no} group by vendor_no
mapper.delete: delete from yomul_vendor_customers where vendor_no = #{vno} and customer_no = #{cno}
